feature.name: Feature_ReceiveIncomingHandoff
feature.description: OpenConsole should be able to receive incoming connections

feature.name: Feature_EditableUnfocusedAppearance
feature.description: The unfocused appearance section in profiles in the SUI that allows users to create and edit unfocused appearances.

feature.name: Feature_AttemptHandoff
feature.description: conhost should try to hand connections over to OpenConsole

feature.name: Feature_ConhostDxEngine
feature.description: Controls whether conhost supports the DX engine and the UseDx registry key

feature.name: Feature_ConhostAtlasEngine
feature.description: Controls whether conhost supports the Atlas engine

feature.name: Feature_DxEngineShaderSupport
feature.description: Controls whether the DX engine is built with shader support.

feature.name: Feature_UseNumpadEventsForClipboardInput
feature.description: Controls whether the clipboard converter (and ConPTY InputStateMachine) uses Numpad events instead of UChar

feature.name: Feature_LegacyConhost
feature.description: conhost should support ForceV2=false, and try to load conhostv1.dll

feature.name: Feature_AtlasEngine
feature.description: If enabled, AtlasEngine is used by default

feature.name: Feature_AtlasEnginePresentFallback
feature.description: We don't feel super confident in our usage of the Present1 API, so this settings adds a fallback to Present on error

feature.name: Feature_NearbyFontLoading
feature.description: Controls whether fonts in the same directory as the binary are used during rendering. Disabled for conhost so that it doesn't iterate the entire system32 directory.

feature.name: Feature_AdjustIndistinguishableText
feature.description: If enabled, the foreground color will, when necessary, be automatically adjusted to make it more visible.

feature.name: Feature_VtPassthroughMode
feature.description: Enables passthrough option per profile in Terminal and ConPTY ability to use passthrough API dispatch engine

feature.name: Feature_VtPassthroughModeSettingInUI
feature.description: Enables the setting gated by Feature_VtPassthroughMode to appear in the UI

feature.name: Feature_ScrollbarMarks
feature.description: Enables the experimental scrollbar marks feature.

feature.name: Feature_DynamicSSHProfiles
feature.description: Enables the dynamic profile generator for OpenSSH config files

feature.name: Feature_AzureConnectionInProc
feature.description: Host the AzureConnection inside Terminal rather than via TerminalAzBridge

feature.name: Feature_ShellCompletions
feature.description: An experimental escape sequence for client applications to request the Terminal display a list of suggestions.

feature.name: Feature_VtChecksumReport
feature.description: Enables the DECRQCRA checksum report, which can be used to read the screen contents
